text.data-name: Build harmony between east and west
text.tspan: Build harmony between east and west

text.data-name: Establish an innovative educational platform to cultivate leaders capable of working for the harmony of humanity and to build a stronger digital society
text.tspan: Establish an innovative educational platform to cultivate leaders capable of working for
the harmony of humanity and to build a stronger digital society

text.data-name: Nurture self-directed, future-oriented global leaders for a harmonious and sustainable world
text.tspan: for a harmonious and sustainable world
